answer: Word limit: 4500 words (main text, 11 typeset pages). Manuscript, covering letter, acknowledgements, author contributions, data availability statement, and online appendix figures (max 20 without main text, 35 with). Figures only if included in main text; supplementary materials and methods with provenance. Maximum of 60 references. Self-contained figures (no image proxy). Max 8000 words (including references).
